wikipedia_page.main: James William Lodge (11 January 1895 – 24 October 1971), also known as Jimmy Barrass, was an English professional footballer who played as a full-back in the Football League for Hull City and Halifax Town, and in non-League football for Cox Lodge, Scotswood, Newburn, Nuneaton Town and York City. He later worked as assistant trainer and specialist masseur at Hull.
